title: The AutoPlay dialog box does not appear when connect E5373s-155 to PC with USB cable
answer:
1.Please check if the computer OS meets one of the following:   

  Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1/SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 (does not support Windows RT) 

 MAC OS X 10.7, 10.8 and 10.9 with latest upgrades 

 Make sure E5373s-155 is turned on (OLED screen has lighten up and have WiFi icon has displayed information asQ4). To turn on E5373s-155, hold and press “Power Key![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39142)” for 3 second. If E5373s-155 is out of battery power, please charge it by USB cable or power adaptor. 

 Find the drive path![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39143) ** Mobile WiFi**. It should appear as one virtual CD-ROM drive in![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39146)  . Double click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39144)**Mobile WiFi** to open the folder of “E5373s-155”, double click “![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39147)AutoRun.exe” to install E5373s-155 and drivers manually.![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39149) 

    If the drive path![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39145)**Mobile WiFi **not showing up, make sure there is no damage on USB cable and no contamination at PC USB connectors. Try to re-plug in USB connectors (both end of USB cable) to E5373s-155 and computer again.
